title: Kaiser Idell Style Table Lamp - Matt Black / Brass 6631T Luxus
body: German silversmith Christian Dell helped shape the Bauhaus approach to industrial lighting and designed the world famous Kaiser Idell Table Lamp in 1931. The flagship of the Kaiser Idell Lamps that was often used on detectives' desks on TV since the 1960 and thus often called the Detective's Lamp. The series is based on a world-patented swivel joint and the characteristic dome embossed with” ORIGINAL KAISER-idell”. The term “idell” is a reference to the word idea and his last name Dell. “Kaiser” is a reference to the original manufacturer- KAISER idell.
